title: "Roadtrip"
format: html
---


```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
# Points
trip_points <- data.frame(
  place = c("Bishop", "Mammoth", "Lake Tahoe", "Redding", "Mt. Bachelor", 
            "Reno", "June Lake"),
  lat = c(37.3634, 37.6485, 39.0968, 40.5865, 43.9793, 
          39.5296, 37.7811),
  lng = c(-118.3952, -118.9721, -120.0324, -122.3917, -121.6880, 
          -119.8138, -119.0732),
  photo = c(
    "Photos/bishop.jpg",
    "Photos/mammoth.jpg",
    "Photos/tahoe.jpg",
    "Photos/redding.jpg",
    "Photos/bachelor.jpg",
    "Photos/reno.jpg",
    "Photos/junelake.jpg"
  ),
  color = c("green", "green", "green", "green", "green", "green", "green")
)

#Leaflet map
leaflet(data = trip_points) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(~lng, ~lat, label = ~place, popup = ~paste0("<b>", place, "</b><br><img src='", photo, "' width='200px'>")) %>%
  addPolylines(~lng, ~lat, color = "#6c584c", weight = 4, opacity = 0.8) %>%
  setView(lng = -120.5, lat = 38.5, zoom = 6)

```
